mcq.statement: Who were made joint secretaries of the All-India Muslim League at its formation?

options.a: Nawab Salimullah Khan and Sir Aga Khan
options.c: Syed Hassan Balgrami and Nawab Salimullah Khan

mcq.one_liner: At the formation of the All-India Muslim League, the joint secretaries were **Nawab Mohsin-ul-Mulk and Nawab Viqar-ul-Mulk**.

suggestions.topic: Services of Sir Syed Ahmad Khan (1817-1898)
